modName: The Deserts Of Elsweyr mod official
summary: A vast desert home of the kahijits and the war has begun the daedra are invading and the goblins have sided with the dragons of the lost dragonborn who traveled to eleswyr. Work in progress
descriptionHtml:
This a duney land and sanding with sandstorms in a hot dangerous place. mod used moonpath to elsewery.IN ORDER TO ENTER YOU MUST FIND THE DESERT CARVAN ON YOUR MAP, SHOULD BE VISIBLE, THERE IS A TRAP DOOR IN THE CARRIAGE. I WAS BEING LASY WITH THE DIALOGE.THE CARRAIGE IS BEHIND THE INN INFRONT OF WHITERUN .NAVMESH IS NOT PUT DOWN FOR SAVING TIME PROBELMS IN CREATION KIT. Dune has interiors but some are empty. This mod is diffucult and requires torches.. The campain will be simmialir to oblvion but you have follow the daedric princes. Part 2 to the campain will be the jungles..Work in progress and this mod uses moonpah to elseweyr things like the therium, i asked him nicely so give his mod and him credit for helping me.this is compatable with moonpath to.
 
Warning: any mod that deletes textures will confic, many elsewyr stuff will be a blueish purple text, that is a null texture asn defualt texture.
 
creature list:(so far)
 
Sand crawler,
 Sand solider,
 Sand crab,
 Elesweyr slautgher fish,
 Sabre lion,
 therium,
 sand lich,
 hyena,
 zombies,
 colossus,
 Moon clan,(warriors)
 Ragasha Goblins( shamans and warriors)
 Mummys
 new dwemer spider(bigger and shoots acid)
 new dwemer sphere(shoots explsoive bolts)
 sand elemenal
 scamp
 srgon(fake god) part of the free form quest
 daedric shaman
 fallen mane lich
 lost ghost adventures
 fire elemenal lord
 Nudium(not spelled right but a giant colluse that is a mixture goelm huge and holds the forth pieace of staff of choas and this boss can be found in the hall of colossus)
 Desert spiders
 Crocodile(very glitchy, sometimes goes on land and thats the glitchy part)
 Rock Giant
 Shadow demon(textures not complete
 Shadow death demon(
 Skeleton lord
 Boar
 Hunger
Minotaur
Elephant
 
locations,(so far)
 Dune,
 topal lakes aybss,
 tomb of zanco,
 gash mine,
 lardoa,
 moon clan,
 Ragasha goblins clans
 shrine of merhunes dagon
 ala doon
 tomb of the fallen manes and souls(4 lvl dungeon,pitch black ,and is a giant mind game full of dangeours.traps included soon)
 naiq osia, (more npcs are being added)
 Hall of colossus
 Cave of fumes(not complete)
 Sun clans
 
weapons and armor,(so far)
 
sand sword,
 gold scimtair,
 dune helment,
 high consul armor set,
 dune armor yet,
 ragasha goblin set,
 ragasha goblin weapon set( waraxes and swords)
 srgons sword(part of a free form quest)
 desert glass set
 Croc armor set
 
Elseweyr desert hazards(so far)
 dust storms,
 sandstorms,(thicker and darker than dust storm)
 wildlife,
 camps,
 ragasha goblin invasions(working on it)
 daedric invaisons(working on it)
 volcano storm(ashstorm in shrine of mol bal only) not added yet but working on it.
 
spells(so far)
 summon dust storm(can be bot at magic harn in dune)
 summon sandstorm(can be found in tomb of zanco)
 summon zancos shade( found in tomb of zanco)
 summon scamp
 summon sand elemenatal
 summon clone(working on it and its found in the tomb of the fallen manes and souls at the end when you fight the boss this will be apart of a daedric quest)
 
Navmesh
 sorry most areas dont have navmesh yet but it will. i have to create the land and dungeons before i do navmesh other wise it doent work.
 
what is navmesh,
 well it is how npcs know where to walk and attack with certian ablitys. the down side of it is that every time navmesh is put down in a area the saving time gets even longer by a lot.
 
Update news
 Minotaur gaurds
new gaurd armor
newe sand crawler stuff
new textures
 

Upcoming 
new and better dust storm effect
 big desert improvement 
new spells and creatures, for instance summon lava pool or spout and lava giant
 foliage in some parts
 campain(Later versions)
 invasions(later version)
 shrine of mol bal(giant volcano with a daedric,mortal,goblin battle outside in a ashland in the mountians with a sacred weapon on top, next veriosn)
 new creatures and armor and weapon sets
 changing some textures and adding a custom house modle to gain the eslewyr feeling
 

plz put videos on youtube and leave a link in coments i need walkthroughs for non belivers and people that need more info.
 
Youtube videos and walkthroughs
 non at the moment
 
No STEALING MY CREATIONS OR EDIING MY DESERT ONLY IF ITS A BUG FIX.
 
ADDTIONS TO THIS MOD MIGHT COME, PART 2 TO THE CAMPAIN IS THE JUNGLES OF ELSEWYR I WILL PUT THE LINK WHEN I UPLOAD, THEN FOR SKYRIM DIABLO FORM I WILL BE MAKING A SKYRIM MONSTER MADDNESS MOD, ADDS NEW FORMS OF CREATURES AND A FEW WEAPONS.
 
Elseweyr ideas places.
 http://elsweyr.wikia.com/wiki/Bestiary creatures most i will make part 1 is desert most desert creatures i will addd and part 2 will have jungle ones, i did not make this website just found info on it.
 http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Elsweyr history and some creature info made by bethsada

some creatures may use the monster mod creatures but there files will be differnt to include heres th link to the skyrim mo monster mod.http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9694


to install mod
1.download hit open
2.drop in data folder in the skyrim directory

to install needed files[meshes and textures]
1.open zip file
2.drop meshes folder in skyrim data folder
3.drop textures folder in skyrim data folder
4.make sure you replace folder if you have it. it will just add the needed files not deleting the other stuff you have from other mods or modding.

the file name is desert of lorgon but that was differnt im changing the name sorry for that

Give credit to dogtown1,star-x,mr sikiia,muppetpuppet,makadamstreet for some the awsome creatures and textures,duzorg and minotaur and elephant and hunger,therium,raptor,zombie and some other  textures and modles.
